49.eng-name: The Description of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
49.ara-name: كتاب صفة النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Zayd ibn Aslam from Ibn Bujayd (formerly al-Ansari) from his grandmother that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, "Give to the very poor, if only a roasted hoof
